content:
The Patient Empowerment workgroup is going to have a track in the January 2021 connectathon to test the Task resource for communicating a patient request for changes. We would love to also have implementers from outside the US to give insight and feedback. If you are interested, please reach out to @Virginia Lorenzi @Debi Willis @Dave deBronkart @John Keyes

FYI:
@Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve
